author: shantikiranc
content:
When using blsync with Geth, the docs recommend selecting a checkpoint that’s ideally “within 1 hour” of the current time.
I’m wondering if it has to be a block that is finalized more recently? I was running into some issues with using an older block hash. Here is the docs in reference: https://geth.ethereum.org/docs/fundamentals/blsync

author: inspector.butters
content:
you can use the latest (most recent) finalized checkpoint. it should be fine. 
an older one should also technically work.
